hair.long: have hair past the shoulders, as long as you'd like

hair.short: have hair cropped close to your skull, or down to the shoulder, or anywhere in between

hair.bowl: have a bowl cut common among monks and soldiers

hair.thin braid: have a skinny braid of hair from short rat tail to long and luxurious

hair.thick braid: have an elaborate, thick braid that takes up most of your hair

hair.dreadlocks: have dreadlocks decorated with beads or bells

hair.Top Knot: no hair except for a single spot

hair.Crazy: have a mohawks, spikes or weird colorings

hair.Wild: have a mass of unkept hair
